descriptionHtml:
[img]http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/594742474792848124/27902A236887B2A0A46C5E28BD76B27289514D1E/[/center] 
Matys Mithril armor V1.2 HD
Contains Standalone Cuirass, Gloves, Boots, Helmet, shield & sword that can be crafted and improved. (must have elven smith perk). Under misc in forge list
From what I have tested it works on all male characters. (If a female version is wanted please endorse :D )
To install just copy all the textures and meshes to their appropriate folders in Skyrim Data. And copy esp. to Skyrim/ Data
Known issues.
While in menu items resort to original meshs. (If anyone knows how to fix this please let me know)
Im still new to modding and have lots to learn but hope you enjoy what I have created :)
Must have my permission to use any of my content.
author: Maty743
